definition: quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals

sentences.english: Always consider designing the application settings.
sentences.chinese: 应该每时每刻都考虑到应用程序的设置。

sentences.english: May she not go in unto her King at every hour?
sentences.chinese: 她可以每时每刻到王的跟前。

sentences.english: But I loved every minute of it.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢教学的每时每刻。

sentences.english: Within it, at all times, it contains its whole potential.
sentences.chinese: 在它体内，在它生命的每时每刻，蕴蓄着全部潜能。

sentences.english: So breathe. And enjoy each moment of this life.
sentences.chinese: 所以要调息，并享受生命的每时每刻。

sentences.english: And I dream about you all the time, You're my wonderwall.
sentences.chinese: 我每时每刻梦见你，你就是我内心深处的迷墙。

sentences.english: I want all the time I can get with you.
sentences.chinese: 我希望每时每刻都能和你在一起。

sentences.english: But, unfortunately, the wind does not blow all the time.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是，风不可能每时每刻都在吹。

sentences.english: Only to get the flowers stolen almost every single time.
sentences.chinese: 仅仅是去买那些每时每刻都可能被偷的花。

sentences.english: I coud not help missing you .
sentences.chinese: 我每时每刻都思念着你。

sentences.english: Everyday and every moment, Our Shanshui Hotel is your home beyond home.
sentences.chinese: 每时每刻，我们山水大厦都是您的“家外之家”。

sentences.english: Energy demand changes all throughout the day, all throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 能源的需求每时每刻每天每年都在变化。

sentences.english: And more information is being released all the time.
sentences.chinese: 另外，每时每刻都有新信息公布于众。

sentences.english: We’re creating the story of our life in each moment.
sentences.chinese: 我们每时每刻都在编织着自己的人生故事。

sentences.english: You are all being Divinely guided within each moment.
sentences.chinese: 你们每时每刻都被神圣指引着。

sentences.english: Being a Buddha is being aware of what is inside of us and around us at every moment.
sentences.chinese: 成为佛，就是每时每刻都觉知我们内在和周围的事情。

definition: at any time/at all times/at the right time
